about_the_game:
The Twelve Slot Saloon is a Turn-Based RPG with Bullet Hell elements! In this game, your choices matter, as the littlest decisions can sometimes have drastic effects on the world.
Can you manage to find a Happy Ending in "The Land Without Happy Endings"?



While you're exploring the world of The Twelve Slot Saloon, you'll encounter enemies that will launch you into brilliantly crafted Turn-Based Battles, called "Silhouette Showdowns".
In these battles, enemies will attack you with a variety of Bullet Hell inspired patterns that will keep you on your feet. From jumping over attacks, to trying to platform mid battle, there's always something to watch out for!


During your turn, you'll get a variety of options to choose from. If you want to resolve battles without having to fight, you can use ACTIONS in order to find a peaceful solution.
Each enemy has their own set of ACTIONS you can choose from, each ACTIONS having a unique Mini-Game to accompany it.
By successfully completing ACTIONS, you can fill up the enemy's Pacify Meter. Once the Pacify Meter is filled, you are given the option to end the battle without violence!


Opposite to ACTIONS, you are also given the option to ATTACK, for a more traditional RPG style of gameplay.
During your turn to ATTACK, you'll be thrown into a Shooter Inspired Mini-Game. The goal in this Mini-Game is to deal damage to the enemy by shooting a target called a CORE.
Once you deal enough damaged to the enemy, you'll be given two options. You can either Spare them, or Finish them off. Your choice here could greatly impact the story, so choose wisely.


Outside of Silhouette Showdowns, you can explore a beautiful desert Wonderland, filled with Charming, Quirky characters!
On the path to your destination, you'll encounter obstacle courses that may prove to be quite a challenge, as you put your platforming and dodging skills to the test! You may also encounter puzzles that might reward you if solved.



There once was a Reaper of Death, who one day, was charged to harvest a soul who was unlike any other they've ever encountered. This soul was kind, and selfless, and only wanted to bring joy to others. This soul never had any of their own dreams come true, but insisted on bringing to life the dreams of others... Until their own dying breath.



This one selfless soul inspired the Reaper, who wanted to carry on this legacy. So the Reaper created a world where dreams can come true, where anyone who receives an invitation, can make a wish, and live in this world filled with undying dreams. However, every wish does cost a price, that price being your soul. Despite that, a great many jump at the invitation, all in hopes to find a Happy Ending.



One day, someone new wakes up in the world; A cat who has no previous memory of anything at all, not even their own wish.
The cat then encounters someone distantly familiar, and they realize this world where "dreams come true", might be falling apart at the seams.
